alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 1:56PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN GENEVA...HOUSTON... NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND HOLMES COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 1256 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Slocomb to 8 miles west of Graceville to 7 miles north of Bonifay to 15 miles northwest of Vernon. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Dothan, Bonifay, Hartford, Taylor, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Malone, Malvern, Rehobeth, Cottondale, Avon, Caryville, Esto, and Madrid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
